css: body { font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 1.6; } h1 { color: #1a5f7a; border-bottom: 2px solid #1a5f7a; padding-bottom: 8px; page-break-before: always; } h1:first-of-type { page-break-before: avoid; } h2 { color: #2c3e50; border-bottom: 1px solid #bdc3c7; padding-bottom: 5px; } h3 { color: #34495e; } table { width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; margin: 15px 0; } th, td { border: 1px solid #ddd; padding: 8px 12px; text-align: left; } th { background-color: #3498db; color: white; } tr:nth-child(even) { background-color: #f2f6fa; } code { background-color: #f4f4f4; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 3px; font-family: 'Consolas', 'Monaco', monospace; } pre { background-color: #2d2d2d; color: #f8f8f2; padding: 15px; border-radius: 5px; overflow-x: auto; } pre code { background: none; padding: 0; } blockquote { border-left: 4px solid #3498db; margin: 15px 0; padding: 10px 20px; background-color: #ecf0f1; } .mermaid { text-align: center; margin: 20px 0; }

pdf_options.headerTemplate: OCRS - Complete Technical Documentation
pdf_options.footerTemplate: Page of
